info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:37PM CDT until July 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kane County in northeastern Illinois... Northwestern DuPage County in northeastern Illinois... Western Cook County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, two severe thunderstorms were located near Valley View and near Elburn, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elgin, Wheaton, Bartlett, Streamwood, Carol Stream, Hanover Park, Addison, Glendale Heights, St. Charles, West Chicago, Batavia, Geneva, Campton Hills, Roselle, Bloomingdale, South Elgin, North Aurora, Winfield, Elburn and Wayne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
